name: Umi
description:
School prototype made in 4 weeks with Tony Doan, Hasan Al Salman, Steven Kok Shun, Leila Essafi and sounds by Ahmed Al Salman.

Special thanks to Raphael Ernaelsten for his volumetric lighting tool "Aura".  https://twitter.com/raphernaelsten/

Installation Instructions

1. Install the .zip file
2. Extract the .zip file in a folder
3. Run the .exe file
4. Enjoy the game!

Umi is just a prototype meaning it has some bugs in it.
